title: New class wizard doesn't default to current type for nested classes
OB: When using the new class wizard in build 20011106, with a .java file open in the editor, clicking the new class button and checking the 'Enclosing Type' option, the field is blank.
EB: The 'Enclosing Type' field should default to the current type in the editor.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Open a .java file in the editor. 2. Click the new class button. 3. Check the 'Enclosing Type' option. 4. Observe that the field is blank instead of defaulting to the current type in the editor.
